    • Constructor Detail

      • ResourceLink

        public ResourceLink​(ResourceSite.Resource type,
                    ResourceSite site)
        Parameters:
        type - Type of resource this link points to.
        site - If not null, will make sure the resource hasn't been previously claimed (scumming a ResourceSite for several ResourceSite.ResourceLinks) and will properly remove it from the game World after it is linked to a Town.
        See Also:
        Actor.remove()
